Package ivory.core.data.stat

Interface Summary
CfTable Interface to object that keeps track of the collection frequency of each term in the collection.
DfTable Interface to object that keeps track of the document frequency of each term in the collection.
DocLengthTable Interface representing an object that keeps track of the length of each document in the collection.
DocScoreTable  
 

Class Summary
CfTableArray Array-based implementation of CfTable.
DfTableArray Array-based implementation of DfTable.
DocLengthTable2B Object that keeps track of the length of each document in the collection as a two-byte integer (shorts).
DocLengthTable4B Object that keeps track of the length of each document in the collection as a four-byte integers (ints).
DocScoreTable4BF  
PrefixEncodedGlobalStats  
PrefixEncodedGlobalStatsWithIndex  
SpamPercentileScore
